item.title: Diagrams as a Code
item.description: Introduction Recently I wanted draw simple network diagram and I recalled nice application I know. It can be used to draw cloud diagrams and it supports main Cloud providers like Azure, AWS, GCP. Just take a look on webpage where you can find some nice examples. I’ve prepared simple Docker image so you can try application without installing anything. Usage Diagrams webpage is full of nice examples and documentation, so go there for furhter reading.
